title: Absolute Named a Leader in G2 Fall 2019 Grid Report for Endpoint Management Software
text:
Verified User Reviews Highlight Power of Absolute Platform in Delivering Endpoint Security and Resiliency for End Customers

VANCOUVER, British Columbia — Absolute (TSX: ABT), the leader in endpoint resilience, today announced the company has achieved a Leader ranking in the G2 Fall 2019 Grid Report for Endpoint Management Software. Based on high levels of customer satisfaction and positive reviews from verified users on G2, Absolute was identified a top vendor compared to similar products in the Endpoint Management Software category.

G2, the world’s leading business solution review platform, leverages more than 790,000 verified user reviews to drive better purchasing decisions. The platform enables buyers to compare and select the best software and services for their needs, based on peer reviews, satisfaction scores, and synthesized social data.

“We are honored and grateful that our customers are willing to go to bat for us and publicly recognize our product innovation, execution, and dedication to continuous optimization and improvement,” said Christy Wyatt, CEO of Absolute. “At Absolute, our number one goal is to be a trusted partner in making our customers more resilient and deliver the visibility, persistence, and intelligence they need to securely and confidently move their businesses forward.”

“Rankings in G2 reports are based on data provided to us by real users,” said Michael Fauscette, Chief Research Officer, G2. “We are excited to share the achievements of the products ranked on our site because they represent the voice of the user and offer terrific insights to potential buyers around the world.”

To view the full G2 Fall 2019 Grid Report for Endpoint Management Software, please visit here. Learn more about what real users have to say, or to leave your own review of Absolute, on our G2 profile.

About Absolute

Absolute empowers more than 12,000 customers worldwide to protect devices, data, applications, and users against theft or attack — both on and off the corporate network. With the industry’s only tamper-proof endpoint visibility and control solution, Absolute allows IT organizations to enforce asset management, security hygiene, and data compliance for today’s remote digital workforces. Absolute’s patented Persistence® technology is embedded in the firmware of Dell, HP, Lenovo, and 22 other leading manufacturers’ devices for vendor-agnostic coverage, tamper-proof resilience, and ease of deployment. See how it works at www.absolute.com and follow us at @absolutecorp.

About G2

G2, the world’s leading business solution review platform, leverages more than 790,000 user reviews to drive better purchasing decisions. Business professionals, buyers, investors, and analysts use the site to compare and select the best software and services based on peer reviews and synthesized social data. Every month, more than three million people visit G2’s site to gain unique insights. To learn more about G2 or write a review, please visit g2crowd.com.
